data.message:
I have a serious problem !! 
I can not see more updates on my wall and overall wall 
I can not talk to friends instant messaging and when I try to send messages I get a blank white page ?! 
What to do?

replies.message: Hi Noam. If your entire Timeline is blank or the only thing loading on your Timeline is your cover photo, please report this. For instructions on how to report, head to our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1r1kPFJ  -Ryan
Thanks for your question, Vvipsem. If your list doesn't load in the chat sidebar, please visit: http://on.fb.me/1rMFqUD -Chantal
Contact me by e-mail regarding facebook or connection method has also required. I want to show Cornell.
